item.title: Applied Stochastic Analysis
item.description: Here are my notes for E, Li, and Vanden-Eijnden’s Applied Stochastic Analysis Chapter 5 - Stochastic Processes 5.1 - Axiomatic Construction of Stochastic Process 5.2 - Filtration and Stopping Time 5.3 - Markov Processes
item.content:encoded:
Here are my notes for E, Li, and Vanden-Eijnden’s Applied Stochastic Analysis

  • Chapter 5 - Stochastic Processes
    • 5.1 - Axiomatic Construction of Stochastic Process
    • 5.2 - Filtration and Stopping Time
    • 5.3 - Markov Processes

item.title: An Invitation to Appied Category Theory
item.description: This is a collection of my notes for Brendan Fong and David Spivak’s An Invitation to Appied Category Theory. The first chapter was done through LaTeX, but the rest should be markdown with mathjax. Chapter 1 - Generative effects: Orders and adjunctions Chapter 2 - Resource theories: Monoidal preorders and enrichment Section 2.2 - Symmetric monoidal preorders
item.content:encoded:
This is a collection of my notes for Brendan Fong and David Spivak’s An Invitation to Appied Category Theory. The first chapter was done through LaTeX, but the rest should be markdown with mathjax.

  • Chapter 1 - Generative effects: Orders and adjunctions
  • Chapter 2 - Resource theories: Monoidal preorders and enrichment
    • Section 2.2 - Symmetric monoidal preorders
